de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.crud

Class ListCRUDController<T extends ModelClassExt>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.crud.CRUDButtonsController
      • de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.crud.ListCRUDController<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICRUDActionsController

    public class ListCRUDController<T extends ModelClassExt>
extends CRUDButtonsController
implements ICRUDActionsController

    Controller for the overview part: CRUD buttons with list.
